title: How to Celebrate Your Teddy Bear's Birthday

steps.headline: Get decorations.
steps.description: Find out what your teddy's favorite thing is, and base your decorations on that. Perhaps you could have some balloons, wallpaper, or posters that you know everyone will like.

steps.headline: Get the right food.
steps.description: Before making any preparations, make sure your teddy and none of the guests are not allergic to anything. Safety first! Then, raid your kitchen or cupboards to see what you can find and, if necessary, do some baking or go to the shops.

steps.headline: Decide what type of party you would like.
steps.description: Disco, fancy dress, traditional, garden, anything you like! Work from there. So, if you were planning on having a disco, make a playlist of music. If you wanted fancy dress, put together some outfits.

steps.headline: Before you have the party, ask if any of your friends would like to come to the teddy bear or stuffed animal's birthday and tell them all to bring their favorite bear.
steps.description: Consider getting invitations. Make your invites bright and colourful, and be sure to include the location, RSVP, dress code, time, date, and any other info you think they might need.

steps.headline: Cut some paper into little doll shapes but make each one smaller than your teddy bear or stuffed animal.
steps.description: These are going to be presents for your bear or stuffed animal.

steps.headline: Take more paper and decorate it.
Take the doll shaped pieces and put them on the inside of the decorated paper.
Wrap them like presents and write the bear or stuffed animal's name on the presents.
Begin the party and set all the bears or stuffed animals on chairs.
Let all the friends and their teddies or stuffed animals keep one present with their bear or stuffed animal's name on it.

text: Get decorations. Find out what your teddy's favorite thing is, and base your decorations on that. Perhaps you could have some balloons, wallpaper, or posters that you know everyone will like. Get the right food. Before making any preparations, make sure your teddy and none of the guests are not allergic to anything. Safety first! Then, raid your kitchen or cupboards to see what you can find and, if necessary, do some baking or go to the shops. Decide what type of party you would like. Disco, fancy dress, traditional, garden, anything you like! Work from there. So, if you were planning on having a disco, make a playlist of music. If you wanted fancy dress, put together some outfits. Before you have the party, ask if any of your friends would like to come to the teddy bear or stuffed animal's birthday and tell them all to bring their favorite bear. Consider getting invitations. Make your invites bright and colourful, and be sure to include the location, RSVP, dress code, time, date, and any other info you think they might need. Cut some paper into little doll shapes but make each one smaller than your teddy bear or stuffed animal. These are going to be presents for your bear or stuffed animal. Take more paper and decorate it.  Take the doll shaped pieces and put them on the inside of the decorated paper.  Wrap them like presents and write the bear or stuffed animal's name on the presents.  Begin the party and set all the bears or stuffed animals on chairs.  Let all the friends and their teddies or stuffed animals keep one present with their bear or stuffed animal's name on it.  Finished.
